SELECT b_warehouse.`b_warehouse_id`, b_warehouse.`b_warehouse_name`, b_warehouse.`b_warehouse_address`, b_warehouse.`xt_provinceID`, b_warehouse.`xt_cityID`, b_warehouse.`xt_districtID`, DATE_FORMAT(b_warehouse.`b_warehouse_ctime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `b_warehouse_ctime`, DATE_FORMAT(b_warehouse.`b_warehouse_mtime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `b_warehouse_mtime`, b_warehouse.`xt_userinfo_id`, b_warehouse.`b_warehouse_type`, xt_province.`NAME` AS xt_provinceName, xt_city.`NAME` AS xt_cityName, xt_district.`NAME` AS xt_districtName, b_warehouse.`b_seller_id`, b_seller.`b_seller_name` FROM b_warehouse b_warehouse LEFT JOIN xt_area_region xt_province ON b_warehouse.xt_provinceID = xt_province.ID LEFT JOIN xt_area_region xt_city ON xt_city.ID = b_warehouse.xt_cityID LEFT JOIN xt_area_region xt_district ON xt_district.ID = b_warehouse.xt_districtID LEFT JOIN b_seller b_seller ON b_seller.b_seller_id = b_warehouse.b_seller_id WHERE 1=1
AND instr(b_warehouse.b_warehouse_name,#{b_warehouse_name})
AND b_warehouse.b_warehouse_type = #{b_warehouse_type}
AND instr(b_seller.b_seller_name,#{b_seller_name})

SELECT b_warehouse.`b_warehouse_id`, b_warehouse.`b_warehouse_name`, b_warehouse.`b_warehouse_address`, b_warehouse.`xt_provinceID`, b_warehouse.`xt_cityID`, b_warehouse.`xt_districtID`, DATE_FORMAT(b_warehouse.`b_warehouse_ctime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `b_warehouse_ctime`, DATE_FORMAT(b_warehouse.`b_warehouse_mtime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `b_warehouse_mtime`, b_warehouse.`xt_userinfo_id`, b_warehouse.`b_warehouse_type`, b_warehouse.`b_seller_id`, b_seller.`b_seller_name` FROM b_warehouse b_warehouse LEFT JOIN b_seller ON b_seller.b_seller_id = b_warehouse.b_seller_id WHERE b_warehouse_id=#{b_warehouse_id}
